name: Zombie Buster VR
description: Zombie Buster VR aims to be an authentic action shooting game that has maximized the feeling of shooting and coolness of battle, which has been the most essential element lacking in existing Shooting VR games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Intel i5-6400 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2300 MB available space
